title: Cadillacâ€™s F1 moonshot: how Apollo mission is guiding new team
summary: Cadillac's Formula 1 entry was approved just 364 days before its first grand prix weekend. We took a look inside its Silverstone base to find out how it's building a brand new team from scratch

qa_pairs.question: When was Cadillac's Formula 1 entry officially approved?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: 364 days before its first grand prix weekend.
wrong_options: Six months before the first race.
One year before the first race.
Three months before its first grand prix weekend.

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of the Apollo mission in relation to Cadillac's F1 team?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It serves as a guiding inspiration for building the new team.
wrong_options: It is a historical event that Cadillac is commemorating.
It represents the technological advancements in F1.
It is a marketing campaign for Cadillac's brand.
